# Unibo

Vendor directory for Unibo Opt-In api integration.

- Api documentation: https://docs.unibo.com/p/aCFUHfWIoIn0Pn/API-Based-Opt-in

The integration requested is only for the `opt_in_player` api method.  
The api documentation outlines the other campaign management endpoints. The request handler has been constructed with possible expansion in mind.
